string.text: Who are you?
Well, well, what do we have here?

You don't need to know who we are, buddy, just know that passing through comes with a price. The kind that's paid in cold, hard cash. Hand over the cash you've got, and maybe we'll let you pass through in one piece.
Fine, fine. Just take what you want and let me be on my way.
Pleasure doing business with you, pal. Now scram before we change our minds and decide to take more than just your gear.
Yeah, yeah... I'm going.
I'm not giving you anything. I earned what I have, and I'm not just handing it over to some low-life scum like you.
Well, well, what do we have here?
You don't need to know who we are, buddy, just know that passing through comes with a price. Hand over your gear and whatever else you got, and we'll let you continue on your little journey.

That's none of your concern, stalker. What matters is that you're in our territory, and we've got a toll for trespassers like you. We want every single thing you've got on you. We want it all, and we want it now. We don't care about your problems. You either hand over everything you've got or you're gonna be a fresh meal for the mutants.

You don't need to know who we are, buddy, just know that passing through comes with a price. The kind that's paid in cold, hard cash. Hand over the cash you've got, and maybe we'll let you pass through in one piece.
Fine, fine. Just take what you want and let me be on my way.
Fine, take it. Just please don't hurt me.
Pleasure doing business with you, pal. Now scram before we change our minds and decide to take more than just your gear.
Yeah, yeah... I'm going.
I'm not giving you anything. I earned what I have, and I'm not just handing it over to some low-life scum like you.

Fine, fine. Just take what you want and let me be on my way.

Pleasure doing business with you, pal. Now scram before we change our minds and decide to take more than just your gear.
Yeah, yeah... I'm going.
I'm not giving you anything. I earned what I have, and I'm not just handing it over to some low-life scum like you.
Well, well, what do we have here?

We're the ones who get paid to take care of business around here. And you... you're about to make our day a whole lot better. We're not asking for much. Just a bit of cash to sweeten the deal, you know? Hand it over, and we'll make sure you don't run into any... unfortunate accidents around here.
Fine. Just take it and let me be on my way.
Pleasure doing business with you, friend.
Yeah, yeah...
I'm not giving you anything. I earned what I have, and I'm not just handing it over to some hired guns.
Well, well, what do we have here?

We're the ones who get paid to take care of business around here. And you... you're about to make our day a whole lot better. We're not asking for much. Just a bit of cash to sweeten the deal, you know? Hand it over, and we'll make sure you don't run into any... unfortunate accidents around here.
Fine. Just take it and let me be on my way.
Pleasure doing business with you, friend.
Yeah, yeah...
I'm not giving you anything. I earned what I have, and I'm not just handing it over to some hired guns.
Halt! Who are you, scum?
I'm just a stalker. Wh-who are you? What do you want?

Silence! Our purpose is sacred, our mission divine. We seek to cleanse this land of all who oppose us, to bring about the ascension of the Monolith. We want obedience. We want loyalty. We want you to cast aside your meaningless existence and embrace the true power of the Monolith. In the Zone, there is only one path to true salvation, and that is through the Monolith. You're either with us or against us. And those who stand against us meet a swift dead end. You have no choice.
Please, I agree. I'll do anything, just spare my life.
Anything? Then swear your allegiance to the Monolith. You embrace our cause, our beliefs. You become one with us now. Betray us, and death will be the least of your worries.
I understand. I won't betray you. Thank you... for sparing me.
I'd rather die as a human than become a mad faceless drone like you!
Halt! Who are you?
I'm just a stalker. Wh-who are you? What do you want?

Silence! The Zone is a miracle. The Masters cleansed us. Soon, we thought, the Zone would cleanse the world. But no. Our small paradise was soon trespassed upon by the flawed people of a sinful world. So we, Sin, must embark upon a quest to fulfil the Masters' wish. We wage war upon the violent to bring about eternal peace. And you are either with us, or you die swiftly as an enemy of Sin.
Please, I agree. I'll do anything.
Very well. Wise choice, stalker. Now, prepare yourself. We have much work to do, and little patience for those who falter.
I understand.
I'd rather die fighting than become a pawn in your twisted game!
Well, well, what do we have here?
You don't need to know who we are, buddy, just know that passing through comes with a price. Hand over your gear and whatever else you got, and we'll let you continue on your little journey.

That's none of your concern, stalker. What matters is that you're in our territory, and we've got a toll for trespassers like you. We want every single thing you've got on you. We want it all, and we want it now. We don't care about your problems. You either hand over everything you've got or you're gonna be a fresh meal for the mutants.

Fine, fine. Just take what you want and let me be on my way.
Fine, take it. Just please don't hurt me.
